--- create_index_interleave.sql
create index foo_bar on foo (
  foo desc
) storing (bar),
  interleave in foobar

--- AST
&parser.CreateIndex{
  pos:          0,
  end:          80,
  Unique:       false,
  NullFiltered: false,
  Name:         &parser.Ident{
    pos:  13,
    end:  20,
    Name: "foo_bar",
  },
  TableName: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  24,
    end:  27,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  Keys: []*parser.IndexKey{
    &parser.IndexKey{
      end:  40,
      Name: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  32,
        end:  35,
        Name: "foo",
      },
      Dir: "DESC",
    },
  },
  Storing: &parser.Storing{
    pos:     43,
    end:     56,
    Columns: []*parser.Ident{
      &parser.Ident{
        pos:  52,
        end:  55,
        Name: "bar",
      },
    },
  },
  InterleaveIn: &parser.InterleaveIn{
    pos:       56,
    TableName: &parser.Ident{
      pos:  74,
      end:  80,
      Name: "foobar",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE INDEX foo_bar ON foo (foo DESC) STORING (bar), INTERLEAVE IN foobar
